menu.title: Game Controls
menu.description: ARD2.0 only utilizes movement from arrow keys.

north.title: north
north.description: To move North press the -up- arrow key.

south.title: south
south.description: To move South press the -down- arrow key.

east.title: east
east.description: To move East press the -right- arrow key.

west.title: west
west.description: To move West press the -left- arrow key.
